meta.description: Tonight we talk to Alan Phillips, JD of VaccineRights.com and PandemicResponseProject.com about the tricky legal minefield surrounding vaccine exemptions and waivers in the US. We also discuss pandemic emergency response and medical martial law, as well as what people can do to obtain reliable and accurate information about saying "no" to vaccines.

title: "Mandatory" Vaccinations (and how to avoid them) (video) - The Corbett Report
cleaned_text:
"Mandatory" Vaccinations (and how to avoid them) (video)

Tonight we talk to Alan Phillips, JD of VaccineRights.com and PandemicResponseProject.com about the tricky legal minefield surrounding vaccine exemptions and waivers in the US. We also discuss pandemic emergency response and medical martial law, as well as what people can do to obtain reliable and accurate information about saying "no" to vaccines.

opengraph.site_name: The Corbett Report - Open Source Intelligence News
opengraph.title: "Mandatory" Vaccinations (and how to avoid them) (video) - The Corbett Report

We also discuss pandemic emergency response and medical martial law, as well as what people can do to obtain reliable and accurate information about saying "no" to vaccines.
